General.Name: Zhongjin Gold Corp Ltd
General.Description: Zhongjin Gold Corp., Ltd. engages in the mining, smelting, and sale of non-ferrous metals in China. The company's products include gold, silver, electrolytic copper, sulfuric acid, iron ore, and other products. Zhongjin Gold Corp., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China.
